q: Eric Schmidt once again defended Page, who's been criticized in some circles as not capable of taking on the CEO mantle, and cited him as the force behind the company's product initiatives. When people criticize Larry as the new CEO, that's grossly unfair to Larry, Eric Schmidt told reporters, according to the Journal.`` He has been with me at every business decision for 10 years.'' , under-resourced newsrooms having to update stories once or twice an hour are desperate for fresh leads.''- The Failed Estate The Andy Coulson affair raises the question- who runs Britain? `` That is only one example of the close ties woven between Tony Blair and Gordon Brown , when they were prime ministers, and Cameron now, and the Murdoch camp- the private meetings and dinners, the calls( no hacking there) and the mutual interest. We once used to think of the establishment as being cabinet ministers, archbishops, BBC panjandrums, leaders of industry and royalty. No longer. It's the links between the government and the Murdoch empire that count today- a shadowy influence-mart. - The Guardian Government of Tunisia shuts down TV channel

Music mogul Simon Cowell , who got engaged to make-up artist Mezhgan Hussainy last year, loves children but says he is getting too old to have them. I worry about it because of my age. When I was a youngster, my dad used to play soccer and games with me. And I worry that if I was 70... `` Also, if children could be born at the age of five I'd quite like that. Zahi Hawass , nothing was stolen from the Egyptian Museum and the 70 damaged pieces can all be repaired. But Dreyfus wonders about the mummies.`` You can't repair a mummy,'' she says. If you have a body that's no longer intact, how are you going to perform any kind of examination of it? It's now contaminated. All authorial proceeds of this book will go to charitable, nonprofit organizations in the State of Vermont-- mostly relating to the needs of children, Graf wrote in an e-mail when asked about where money from book sales would go. as the Wi-Spy incident, and to call CEO Eric Schmidt to testify under oath. In a letter to Darrell Issa , Jamie Court , Consumer Watchdog president and John M. Simpson , Inside Google Inc. Project director, wrote: An investigation by the committee of Google Inc. 's relationship to the Administration is particularly timely now in light of the way the Federal Trade Commission closed its probe of the Wi-Spy incident, and the Department of Justice's current review of the pending acquisition of ITA Software. http://insidegoogle.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/GOOGGovfinal012411.pdf http://insidegoogle.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/LtrIssa012411final.pdf The report, Lost in the Cloud: Google Inc. and the US Government, is drawn from records obtained through the Freedom of Information Act and interviews.
